Package de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers

Class RatingController

java.lang.Object
de.fourzerofournotfound.rateyourstuff.rays.controllers.RatingController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/rest/ratings")
public class RatingController
extends java.lang.Object

This Controller provides basic REST Interfaces to interact with Rating entities from the database

Author:
Christoph Frischmuth, John Klippstein, Mickey Knop, Robin Beck

    • RatingController

      @Autowired public RatingController​(RatingRepository ratingRepository, PageableService pageableService, RatingService ratingService)

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/all") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<RatingDto>> getAll​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="createdAt") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") java.lang.String order)
      This method is used to get all ratings from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      Returns:
      a list of rating dtos

    • getAllByMediumId

      @GetMapping("/all/medium/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<RatingDto>> getAllByMediumId​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="createdAt") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") java.lang.String order, @PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId)
      This method is used to get all ratings for a specific medium from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      mediumId - the id of the medium that should be searched
      Returns:
      a list of rating dtos

    • getAllByUserId

      @GetMapping("/all/user/{userId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<RatingDto>> getAllByUserId​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="50") int size, @RequestParam(defaultValue="createdAt") java.lang.String orderBy, @RequestParam(defaultValue="desc") java.lang.String order, @PathVariable java.lang.Long userId)
      This method is used to get all ratings with a specific user id from the database
      Parameters:
      page - the current page (optional)
      size - the number of items per page
      orderBy - the attributed that should be ordered
      order - the order (asc, desc)
      userId - the id of the user that should be searched
      Returns:
      a list of rating dtos

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RatingDto> getById​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws RatingNotFoundException
      This method is used to get a specific rating by its id from the database
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the rating
      Returns:
      a dto of the found rating
      Throws:
      RatingNotFoundException - if there is no rating with the given id

    • getByUserIdAndByMediumId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}/medium/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RatingDto> getByUserIdAndByMediumId​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long userId, @PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId) throws RatingNotFoundException
      This method is used to get a rating from a specific user for a specific medium from the database
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user that is linked to the rating
      mediumId - the id of the medium that is linked to the rating
      Returns:
      a dto of the found rating
      Throws:
      RatingNotFoundException - if there is no rating for the given user and medium

    • add

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @PostMapping(path="/add", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RatingDto> add​(@RequestBody Rating rating) throws InvalidRatingException
      This method is used to add a new rating to the database. In order to prevent duplicate ratings in the database, this method automatically checks if there is already a rating with the same user id and medium id. If there is already an existing rating, it will be updated
      Parameters:
      rating - the rating that should be added to the database
      Returns:
      a dto of the newly added (or updated, if it already existed) rating
      Throws:
      InvalidRatingException - if the rating contains invalid values

    • update

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @PutMapping(consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RatingDto> update​(@RequestBody Rating rating) throws RatingNotFoundException
      This method is used to update an existing rating. It updates the description and the given points of the rating
      Parameters:
      rating - the rating that should be updated
      Returns:
      a dto of the saved rating
      Throws:
      RatingNotFoundException - if there is no rating with the given rating id

    • deleteRating

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'User\')") @DeleteMapping("/{id}") org.springframework.http.HttpStatus deleteRating​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long id) throws RatingNotFoundException
      Deletes the given rating
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the rating that should be deleted
      Returns:
      http status 200
      Throws:
      RatingNotFoundException - if there is no rating with the given id

    • countRatings

      @GetMapping("/count/{mediumId}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Long> countRatings​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long mediumId)
      This Method is used to count the number of ratings for a certain medium
      Parameters:
      mediumId - the id of the medium for which ratings should be counted
      Returns:
      the number of ratings for the given medium
